title: The Irish Times
author: Gerry Murray
description: Irish news, world news and breaking updates. Get Ireland news, business, politics, sport, lifestyle, culture, podcasts, video and more from The Irish Times, the definitive brand of award-winning, in-depth journalism.
cleaned_text: Tue Sep 12 2023 Trusted journalism since 1859 MORE TOP STORIES 1 'When I see another eejit using a Centra bag as carry-on, I wonder how so many of us managed to emigrate' As rescue efforts continue across Morocco, some villages near the epicentre of the recent earthquake are still waiting for assistance.
